   d   i   v   &gt;   i   m   g       a   l   t   =   "   D   C   S   I   M   G   "       i   d   =   "   D   C   S   I   M   G   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   t   .   o   .   n   y   t   i   m   e   s   .   c   o   m   /   d   c   s   y   m   5   7   y   w   1   0   0   0   0   s   1   s   8   g   0   b   o   o   z   t   _   9   t   1   x   /   n   j   s   .   g   i   f   ?   d   c   s   u   r   i   =   /   n   o   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   W   T   .   j   s   =   N   o   &amp;a   m   p   ;   W   T   .   t   v   =   1   .   0   .   7   "   /   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
   /   n   o   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   T   a   c   o   d   a   _   A   M   S   _   D   D   C   _   a   d   d   P   a   i   r   (   "   t   _   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   "   M   o   v   i   e   s   "   )   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   T   a   c   o   d   a   _   A   M   S   _   D   D   C   _   a   d   d   P   a   i   r   (   "   s   i   t   e   "   ,   "   n   y   t   i   m   e   s   .   c   o   m   "   )   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   T   a   c   o   d   a   _   A   M   S   _   D   D   C   (   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   t   e   .   n   y   t   i   m   e   s   .   c   o   m   /   t   t   e   /   b   l   a   n   k   .   g   i   f   "   ,   "   1   .   0   "   )   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   	   
   i   m   g       C   L   A   S   S   =   "   h   i   d   d   e   n   "       S   R   C   =   "   /   a   d   x   /   b   i   n   /   c   l   i   e   n   t   s   i   d   e   /   c   1   f   e   7   1   3   e   Q   2   F   H   H   H   H   H   H   Q   2   B   H   Q   2   B   7   a   @   Q   3   B   Q   5   E   )   Q   5   E   1   H   H   H   H   H   H   H   H   Q   2   B   Q   3   B   3   Q   5   E   H   Q   5   E   a   .   1   H   H   Q   3   A   Q   3   B   7   Q   3   B   .    /   b   o   d   y   &gt;   
   
   /   h   t   m   l   &gt;
